job description:
Note: To apply for this job, submit your application by clicking on the Apply Now button on this page

Data has become the driving force to moving us forward, with confidence, on all business decisions. Were hiring talented and passionate data scientist to solve problems as we integrate data science and machine learning techniques into the new HDM platform. The ideal candidate has extensive experience working with python, SQL, distributed, service oriented architecture (SOA) systems and writing clean object-oriented code.

Responsibilities
  • Be part of the team that continues to architect and build on company's content platform
  • Work on challenging fundamental data science problems in online publishing.
  • Formulate, implement, test, and validate virous predictive models, such as linear regression, tree models, etc.
  • Discover actionable insights from data and present informative and clear visualizations to support these actions.
  • Measurably impact the business KPIS with high-quality solutions.
  • Participate in key software design decisions
  • Write expressive code that is efficient and extensible
  • Be ready to adapt and extend the architectural plan as new product goals and technical challenges emerge
Desired Skills and Experience

Skills & Requirements
  • Advanced degree in a relevant technical field (machine learning, computer science, statistics, physics, mathematics, or related field), or 4+ years experience in a relevant role
  • The ability to take a feature or service to full completion, from working with our back-end tech Python
  • Demonstrably robust experience with:

o SaaS design / RESTful API integration
o Python, pandsa, scikit-learn, Django
o Google Cloud Platform, BigQuery, Google Analystics, DFP
o Experience following the ES6 spec preferred
o Strong foundational knowledge of web technologies on both ends of the stack
o Understanding relational databases / data models
o Working in an Agile development team (Scrum highly desired)
o Linux
o Performance tuning / caching strategies
